name: Zoom Meeting SDK Auth Endpoint sample
description: Generate a Meeting SDK JWT to join Zoom meetings and webinars with the Meeting SDK.

ZOOM_MEETING_SDK_KEY.description: Your Zoom Meeting SDK Key or Client ID for Meeting SDK app type's created after February 11, 2023, found on your Zoom Meeting SDK app's credentials page

ZOOM_MEETING_SDK_SECRET.description: Your Zoom Meeting SDK Secret or Client Secret for Meeting SDK app type's created after February 11, 2023, found on your Zoom Meeting SDK app's credentials page
